description: text/scanner: report illegal hexadecimal numbers (bug fix)

messages.text:
On Wed, Aug 15, 2012 at 9:34 AM,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6450136/diff/6003/src/pkg/text/scanner/scanner.go
> File src/pkg/text/scanner/scanner.go (right):
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6450136/diff/6003/src/pkg/text/scanner/scanner.go#newcode417
> src/pkg/text/scanner/scanner.go:417: s.error("illegal octal number")
> s/number/digit/ ?

The error message points to the beginning of the octal number, so
"digit" would be misleading. Changing the error position to the right
digit would require changing the error handling. Left as is for now.

>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6450136/

LGTM
